step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Good hold! You maintained the position effectively.
You're returning to the start position. Focus on a smooth reversal of the motion.
Second rep, starting strong with hands clasped in your lap.
Good movement towards your forehead. Continue to focus on keeping those elbows relatively close.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep that head up!
You held the position well. Great control!
Smooth return to the starting position. You completed the exercise well.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when bringing your hands forward and spread them wide behind your head. Maintain an upright posture throughout the movement for best results.
